Desc.entry: Can signpost for general benefits advice. Provides job vacancy search via job points. Provides appointments for people living in postcode areas S5 (6 & 7), S6 (1, 2, 4, 5 & 6), and S36 (1, 2, 3 & 4).

Telephone.entry: 0845 600 1267 Benefit enquiry line for existing claims, 0800 055 6688 new claims
0800 032 7950 Crisis Loans, 0845 608 8671 Social Fund Enquiries, 0845 606 0234 Jobseekers Direct, Mon-Fri 8am-6pm, Sat 9am-1pm
